title: Drawing, Abby Aldrich Greene Rockefeller Apartment: Two Bedrooms, 1930–32
title_raw: Abby Aldrich Greene Rockefeller Apartment: Two Bedrooms
medium: Graphite, pink colored pencil, and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower left: ROOMS # 713 & # 714; lower right: ROOM 713/2 BEDS/2 NIGHT TABLE/1 DESK/1 CHAISE/1 CHEST/1 UPH CHAIR/1 FLOOR LAMP/CARPET/DRAPERIES; to the right: ROOM 714/1 BED/2 NIGHT TABLES/ 1 DESK/1 DESK CHAIR/1 UPH CHAIR/1 UPH ARM CHAIR/2 CHEST/1 LARGE CHEST/1 CHAISE/2 FLOOR LAMPS/3 TABLE LAMPS/CARPET/DRAPERIES/1 MIRROR; dimensions and instructions throughout.
description: Plan and elevations for Room # 713 and Room # 714. The smaller room, # 713 at left has two small twin beds on left wall; night table beside each bed. Entrance to right of beds on left wall. Two draped windows on far wall, with desk between windows and mirror above desk; upholstered chair and ottoman in upper right corner of room and chest on upper right wall. Door on lower right wall and lower wall at right. Two unidentified rooms separate Room # 713 and Room # 714. Entrance to Room # 714 at center of left wall; tall chest on both sides of door, and second door at lower left wall. Chaise lounge and floor lamp in upper left corner. Two windows on far wall, with large mirror between each window; table in front of mirror at center. Upholstered armchair and table lamp in upper right corner. Low chest at center of right wall with circular mirror above. Upholstered armchair with tubular arms in lower right corner. Double-bed at center of lower wall and flanked by two night tables.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Abby Aldrich Greene Rockefeller Apartment: Two Bedrooms, 1930–32. Graphite, pink colored pencil, and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. 
Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-487
